main event: A bluish-green brilliant light was observed in the sky, producing small red bursts with the sound of an explosion in Levittown, New York on November 21, 1957.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for a few seconds,The object was reported as a possible meteorite or military aircraft,The observation was made by a civilian,Sound of explosion was heard but not inside the observation location,Weather conditions were reported as clear.
sighted object: bluish-green brilliant light with small red bursts
